title: Merge three pages (index.html#features, workspace-v3.html, Araya chat)
fix_description: ALREADY COMPLETED - Bug #26 merged index.html and workspace-v3.html. External Araya chat (https://6900eed7f2455b1690e62836--verdant-tulumba-fa2a5a.netlify.app/) already integrated via 'Chat with Araya' action card (completed in bugs #70-72). All three pages are now accessible from unified index.html.

integration_status.araya_chat_link: Already integrated - opens in new window via action card
